titles.title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to allow an adult member of a family or household to attest to the citizenship status of other family or household members, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5218)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Amends title XI of the Social Security Act to allow an adult member of a family or household to attest to the citizenship status of other family or household members.
